name: AP_CLAIM_IF_PX_AF_HAC_ROM
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Interface Info - Grouper Px - Affect HAC Adj ROM Flg (I CLM 21868) item.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PX_AFF_HAC_ADJ_ROM
columns.description: Indicates how the procedure affected the risk of mortality (ROM) assignment following hospital-acquired condition (HAC)-adjusted diagnosis related group (DRG) processing.
